channel.title: Need help Moving NPCS& Editing Client
channel.description:
Hello,
Im really new at this RS PS server devolpment but im a quick learner!
Can anyone show me how i can move NPC'S from one place to another
For example if i want to move a npc from Cor. 1 1 to Cor 2 2
Please be detailed!
**EDIT And i had one more question!!
How do i edit on a CLIENT on the top left where it says ''File''
When you click it .. it says Vote , Donate , Website... How do i edit that so when people click on it they go to my website..

item.title: Need help Moving NPCS& Editing Client
item.dc:creator: @TooFamous TooFamous
item.description:
@TooFamous wrote:

uhm i dont have gui.java but i think ''Client java ‘’ is the same and when i search spawn config i get npc handler ?? Is that the same but when i go to those 2 files i cant find what u posted here =/

Sorri if i sound a little bit slow if im wrong right now

help

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Moving NPCS& Editing Client

item.title: Need help Moving NPCS& Editing Client
item.dc:creator: @totalystylin1 totalystylin1
item.description:
@totalystylin1 wrote:

To move npc’s.

go to spawn-config.cfg, and you’ll see alot of things like this

just change the numbers. for ex.

To change the client.

go in GUI.java and search

then look under that and change the website to yours:

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
